title: Add next small batch of skills to the skill matrix

requirements.text: Add a small batch of discipline skills (no more than 5 at a time) to the backend skill matrix in main.mo, continuing from where the previous batch left off. Each skill should include all required fields (id, name, description, category, stat requirements, level requirement, unlock status defaults).
acceptanceCriteria: Up to 5 new discipline skills are added to the backend skill matrix without causing a build failure
Each new skill has all required fields populated correctly
Existing skills and game state are preserved

requirements.text: Update the frontend SkillsPage.tsx to display the newly added batch of skills, grouped by category and showing unlock status and requirements consistently with existing skill entries.
acceptanceCriteria: Newly added skills appear in the correct category group on the Skills page
Unlock requirements and status are displayed correctly for new skills
Existing skill display is not broken

constraints: Add no more than 5 skills in this batch to avoid build failures
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or any files under frontend/src/components/ui
Preserve all existing skills and player state
nonGoals: Adding all 39 skills in a single batch
Changing the skill unlock mechanism or UI layout
